data.message:
#ملأ_الدم_وطني 
#Syria
#Save_Syria
#حلب_تحترق 
#انقذوا_حلب 
#SaveAleppo 
#StopTheHolocaust 
#AleppoIsBurning

Dear Mark Zuckerburg

Why can't our families and friends in Aleppo check in on Facebook to ensure their safety and wellbeing?

Why is there not an option for our profile pictures to show the Syrian flag so we can show our solidarity with Aleppo?

Are we not human? Is not this a tragedy and a crime against humanity?

I ask my friends outside Syria to share this. Maybe for once the victims' pleas may be heard. 

Share this status so the world knows!

#saveAleppo #alepppisburning #saveSyria #solidarityforAleppo
#facebook #markzuckerburg
